Player History
Drafted in 9th round, 132nd overall pick, by Chicago in 2015...
Earned first career win on 4/4/2015...
Had first career hit on 5/20/2015, off Ramon Cobas (BOS)...
Was selected to the 2016 Allstar game...
Injured on 5/9/2017 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 7/21/2017 with a Tight Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...

Was claimed off waivers by San Francisco on 7/6/2018.
Injured on 8/26/2018 with a Blister On Finger, out for 6 days...
Injured on 8/18/2019 with a Pulled Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Signed as a free agent by Montreal on 2/1/2020 to a 2-year deal worth $3,000,000 per year...
Released by Montreal on 4/1/2021...
Signed as a free agent by Houston on 4/11/2021 to a minor league deal...

Released by Philadelphia on 4/11/2022...
